title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4L.01 - General Design and Operation of Flashing Beacons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4L.01 - General Design and Operation of Flashing Beacons

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 04. INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 03A A beacon shall not be included within the border of a
sign. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
4L.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
